zh-cn: 吉尊降白阿旺洛桑益喜丹增嘉措师松旺觉聪巴密白德贝桑布

birth_place.zh-cn: 中华民国青海省西宁县红崖村
birth_place.en: Taktser, Xining, Qinghai, Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 第十四世达赖喇嘛，西藏政治和宗教的象征人物。
丹增嘉措的父亲。
description.en: Father of Tenzin Gyatso.

description.zh-cn: 丹增嘉措的母亲。
description.en: Mother of Tenzin Gyatso.

description.zh-cn: 第十三世达赖喇嘛，丹增嘉措的前世。
description.en: The 13th Dalai Lama, predecessor of Tenzin Gyatso.

description.zh-cn: 时任中国共产党中央委员会主席、中央人民政府主席。
description.en: Then Chairman of the Central Committee of the CCP and Chairman of the Central People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 时任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: Then Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 时任全国人民代表大会常务委员会委员长。
description.en: Then Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 时任全国人民代表大会常务委员会委员长。
description.en: Then Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

nodes.id: 班禅额尔德尼·确吉坚赞

zh-cn: 班禅额尔德尼·确吉坚赞

description.zh-cn: 第十世班禅额尔德尼。
description.en: The 10th Panchen Lama.

description.zh-cn: 西藏噶厦政府官员，后任中华人民共和国政府官员。
description.en: An official of the Kashag government of Tibet, later an official in the PRC government.

description.zh-cn: 时任印度总理。
description.en: Then Prime Minister of India.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期统治青海省的军阀。
description.en: Warlord who ruled Qinghai province during the Republic of China era.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院副总理。
description.en: Vice Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 西藏流亡政府。
description.en: Tibetan government-in-exile.

nodes.id: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的常设立法机关。
description.en: The permanent legislative body of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 西藏自治区筹备委员会

zh-cn: 西藏自治区筹备委员会
en: Preparatory Committee for the Tibet Autonomous Region

description.zh-cn: 为建立西藏自治区而设立的筹备机构。
description.en: A preparatory body established for the creation of the Tibet Autonomous Region.

description.zh-cn: 1912年至1951年西藏的武装力量。
description.en: The armed forces of Tibet from 1912 to 1951.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The chief administrative authority of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 美国联邦政府的主要情报机构之一。
description.en: One of the principal intelligence-gathering agencies of the United States federal government.

description.zh-cn: 藏人行政中央的最高行政首长。
description.en: The head of the Central Tibetan Administration.

description.zh-cn: 负责评选诺贝尔和平奖得主的机构。
description.en: The committee responsible for selecting the recipient of the Nobel Peace Prize.

nodes.id: 中央人民政府和西藏地方政府关于和平解放西藏办法的协议

zh-cn: 中央人民政府和西藏地方政府关于和平解放西藏办法的协议
和平解放西藏办法的协议
en: Agreement of the Central People's Government and the Local Government of Tibet on Measures for the Peaceful Liberation of Tibet

description.zh-cn: 将年幼的丹增嘉措及其家人扣留，并索要巨额赎金后才允许其前往拉萨。
description.en: Detained the young Tenzin Gyatso and his family, demanding a large ransom before allowing them to travel to Lhasa.

relationships.target: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 曾任第一届和第二届全国人大常委会副委员长。
description.en: Served as Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee for the 1st and 2nd National People's Congress.

relationships.target: 西藏自治区筹备委员会

description.zh-cn: 发动昌都战役，向昌都进军。
description.en: Launched the Battle of Chamdo, advancing on Chamdo.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军在昌都战役中击败藏军。
description.en: The People's Liberation Army defeated the Tibetan Army in the Battle of Chamdo.

description.zh-cn: 昌都战役后，西藏局势紧张，丹增嘉措被请求提前亲政，执掌西藏的政教大权。
description.en: After the Battle of Chamdo, the situation in Tibet became tense, and Tenzin Gyatso was asked to assume full political power ahead of schedule.

description.zh-cn: 因骚乱爆发及担心生命安全，丹增嘉措于1959年3月17日离开拉萨，流亡印度。
description.en: Due to the outbreak of the uprising and fears for his safety, Tenzin Gyatso left Lhasa on March 17, 1959, fleeing into exile in India.

description.zh-cn: 1959年流亡印度后，在达兰萨拉建立藏人行政中央政府。
description.en: After fleeing to India in 1959, he established the Central Tibetan Administration in Dharamshala.

description.zh-cn: 宣布卸下所有职务与权力，移交给民主选举产生的司政负责领导，结束了达赖喇嘛长期的政教合一传统。
description.en: Announced his retirement from all duties and powers, transferring them to the democratically elected Sikyong, ending the long tradition of the Dalai Lama's temporal and spiritual rule.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 通过《关于撤销达赖职务的决定》，撤销其西藏自治区筹备委员会主任委员及全国人大常委会副委员长职务。
description.en: Passed the 'Decision on the Dismissal of the Dalai from His Posts', removing him as Chairman of the Preparatory Committee for the TAR and Vice Chairman of the NPC Standing Committee.

description.zh-cn: 1954年9月前往北京参加第一届全国人民代表大会，会前与毛泽东会面。
description.en: In September 1954, he went to Beijing to attend the First National People's Congress and met with Mao Zedong beforehand.

description.zh-cn: 在印度参加释迦牟尼涅槃2500周年纪念法会期间，与周恩来数次会谈。
description.en: During his attendance at the 2500th anniversary of Buddha's nirvana in India, he had several meetings with Zhou Enlai.

description.zh-cn: 在印度期间曾向尼赫鲁寻求可能的政治庇护。
description.en: Sought possible political asylum from Nehru during his stay in India.

description.zh-cn: 与习仲勋有著亲密的友谊，曾赠送其一块手表。
description.en: Had a close friendship with Xi Zhongxun and once gifted him a watch.

description.zh-cn: 1959年流亡印度并建立藏人行政中央后，与中华人民共和国政府长期处于政治对立状态。
description.en: After fleeing to India in 1959 and establishing the Central Tibetan Administration, he has been in a long-term state of political opposition to the government of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中情局西藏项目向藏人行政中央及相关武装活动提供资金支持，以对抗中国政府。
description.en: The CIA's Tibet program provided financial support to the Central Tibetan Administration and related armed activities to oppose the Chinese government.

description.zh-cn: 六四事件后，挪威诺贝尔委员会授予丹增嘉措诺贝尔和平奖，部分原因是为了对中国政府施加压力。
description.en: After the Tiananmen Square protests, the Norwegian Nobel Committee awarded the Nobel Peace Prize to Tenzin Gyatso, partly to exert pressure on the Chinese government.

description.zh-cn: 授予1989年诺贝尔和平奖，以表彰其为解放西藏所做的和平斗争。
description.en: Awarded the 1989 Nobel Peace Prize in recognition of his peaceful struggle for the liberation of Tibet.
